summary: The town of Newport in Wales could get a hefty reward if the treasure is found in the trash.
title: UK Man Offers Council $72M if He Finds Discarded Bitcoin Trove at Landfill
content: A U.K. IT engineer who mistakenly threw away a hard drive with around Â£210 million (US$288 million) of bitcoin on it is asking the local government once again to allow him to search the local landfill for his device.
